name: Little Puff in Dragonland
description: Little Puff in Dragonland is a puzzle/adventure game in vein of the Dizzy series. The main character - Little Puff - is a tiny dragon who wants to get back home. In order to do so the player needs to avoid various creatures (that will instantly kill the protagonist), collect and combine items in a logical way (Puff can hold up to 3 at once in his inventory) and simply stay alive as the poor lizard is given only one life, even without a health bar.
